text: João Bosco Papaléo Paes (August 27, 1952 – June 25, 2020), better known simply as Papaléo Paes, was a Brazilian politician. Paes was born in Belém, Pará. Paes was Mayor of Macapá from 1993 to 1996. He was a Senator from 2003 to 2011. He was also Vice-Governor of Amapá from 2015 to 2018. He was a member of the Brazilian Social Democracy Party. Paes died on June 25, 2020 from COVID-19 in Macapá, aged 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Politicians from Pará Category:People from Belém
title: Papaléo Paes
